---
name: Enhancement
about: Suggest an improvement to existing functionality (not a new feature or bug)
title: ""
labels: enhancement
assignees: ""
---

**What exists today?**
A clear description of the current behavior or functionality you'd like to see improved.

**What improvement are you proposing?**
A clear and concise description of what should change and how.
Be specific — avoid "make it better." Explain _what_ better looks like.

**Why does this improvement matter?**
Describe the motivation and impact. Who benefits and how?
Ex. This affects users who [...] / This currently causes friction because [...]

**Is this a breaking change?**

- [ ] No — fully backward compatible
- [ ] Minor — small impact, easy to adapt
- [ ] Yes — existing behavior or API changes
- [ ] Unsure

**Alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative approaches you've thought about
and why you're proposing this one instead.

**Are you willing to implement this?**

- [ ] Yes — I'd like to open a PR
- [ ] Partially — I can help but may need guidance
- [ ] No — submitting for the team to consider

**Additional context**
Add any other context, screenshots, benchmarks, or links to related issues here.
